mapper.insert: insert into mg_material (material_id, material_name, layer_level, category_id, color_id, insert_time, insert_by) values (#{materialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{layerLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mg_material set material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layer_level = #{layerLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select material_id, material_name, layer_level, category_id, color_id, insert_time, insert_by from mg_material where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select material_id, material_name, layer_level, category_id, color_id, insert_time, insert_by from mg_material
